name: 3 Triplets, 18 Tits
description:
You started working at this company that creates pictures of beautiful female triplets. You must choose sets of 3 photos to satisfy customers.

The objective of the game is to identify a SET of 3 images from 12 images on the screen. Each image has four characteristics, which can vary as follows:
  • Number of models In the photo
  • Type Of Clothing
  • Background
  • Models

A SET consists of 3 images in which each of the characteristics of the image, seen one by one, are the same in each image, or are different in each image. All resources must separately satisfy this rule.


In other words: the number of models in the image must be the same on the 3 images or different on each of the 3 images; the type of clothing must be the same in the 3 images, or different in each of the 3, etc.

Features

  • 81 pictures of beautiful women
  • 27 nude women pictures
  • Relaxing music
